feed.title: Poenskelisten Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Poenskelisten: v2.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/31
  • Dependency updates and DB call fix by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/32
  • Dependency updates by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/34

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/compare/v2.0.6...v2.0.7

entry.title: New release for Poenskelisten: v2.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed creating wishlists within a group by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/38 (#37)
  • Dependency upgrades by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/39

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/compare/v2.0.7...v2.0.8

entry.title: New release for Poenskelisten: v2.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed password reset API endpoints by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/42
  • Dependencies upgraded by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/43

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/compare/v2.0.8...v2.0.9

entry.title: New release for Poenskelisten: v2.1.0
entry.content:
Big changes! Please create issues if you experience any... ugh... issues. ðŸš€

What's Changed

  • Giant overhaul by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/56
  • More mobile friendly UI by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/57
  • Left side currency and hidden claimers option by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/58 (#46)
  • Invalid token redirect fix & private key length increase by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/59
  • Option to conceal claimer (#54)
  • URL tool-tip on web page links (#53)
  • News item publishing on date and optional expiry date (#52)
  • Wishes and wishlists now show when updated and affects sorting (#51)
  • Wish price is now a float (decimals) (#50)
  • Fixed bug where news date was wrong (#49)
  • Tagged branches now show the correct version tag (#48)
  • Command line options/flags now override config file (#47)
  • Added image volume to docker compose example (#44)
  • Added option to delete accounts (#27)
  • Added notifications for deleted claimed wishes
  • Dependency updates
  • Removed DB upgrade option for older DB version

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/compare/v2.0.9...v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Poenskelisten: v2.1.1
entry.content:
HOTFIX

What's Changed

  • Fixed bug where new config file doesn't have private key by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/61
  • Fixed an issue where private key was loaded before main code by @aunefyren in https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/pull/62

Full Changelog: https://github.com/aunefyren/poenskelisten/compare/v2.1.0...v2.1.1
